qas.question: What are also in the precincts of Westminster Abbey?

answers.text: Westminster School and Westminster Abbey Choir School

qas.question: Who required the Benedictine monks to maintain a charity school?
When were the Benedictine monks required to maintain a charity school?
The choirboys of the abbey are trained where?

plausible_answers.text: Westminster School and Westminster Abbey Choir School

qas.question: What are also in the precincts of Eastminster Abbey?
Who never required the Benedictine monks to maintain a charity school?
Who required the Benedictine monks to maintain a vanity school?
When were the Benedictine monks required to maintain a vanity school?
The altar boys of the abbey are trained where?

context: <a0_0><b4_0>Westminster School and <a3_0><b8_0>Westminster Abbey Choir School<b8_0/><b4_0/><a3_0/><a0_0/> are also in the precincts of the abbey. It was natural for the learned and literate monks to be entrusted with education, and Benedictine monks were required by <a1_0><b5_0><b6_0>the Pope<b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/> to maintain a charity school in <a2_0><b7_0>1179<b7_0/><a2_0/>. The Choir School educates and trains the choirboys who sing for services in the Abbey.
